definition: to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent

sentences.english: Objective To explore the local mechanism of caries prevention of fluoridated milk.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索氟化牛奶在口腔局部的防齲作用機制。

sentences.english: DNA immunization is one of the stratigies in control of classic swine fever, a viral disease.
sentences.chinese: 免疫防齲是目前齲病預防研究的熱點之一。

sentences.english: Most toothpastes contain fluoride, which has been proven to prevent cavities.
sentences.chinese: 大多數牙膏含氟，氟是可以防齲的。

sentences.english: Today anticarious immunization becomes one of the focuses in caries preventative study.
sentences.chinese: 免疫防齲是目前齲病預防研究的熱點之一。

sentences.english: Conclusion Applying the protecting lacquer contained fluorin to prevent caries had a significant effect.
sentences.chinese: 結論氟保護膝防齲效果明顯，操作簡便，適合推廣。

sentences.english: It is the only sweetener to show both passive and active anti-caries effects.
sentences.chinese: 它是唯一的甜味劑，顯示被動和主動的防齲效果。
